Comments_List: Conceptual skills, history of philosophy, application of theory to historical and current events, writing skills
Pr. Angermann is incredibly effective professor who also engages each student individually to address theoretical insights and concerns.

I would recommend this class to anyone interested in important developments in continental philosophy and modern political theory, as well as recommend this professor to anybody who wants to expand their theoretical horizons with a rigorous yet compassionate teacher.
